column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " I feel like I 've lost part of my identity .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I used to be boomerang guy ... " Merchant says : " Hey , Water Tribe money !
#Text=" Katara says : " I hope that 's okay .
#Text=" Merchant says : " So long as it 's money .
#Text=Have a nice Avatar Day !
#Text=" Aang says : " Avatar Day ?
#Text=" Merchant says : " You guys are going to the festival , right ?
#Text=" Aang says : " There 's a holiday for the Avatar .
#Text=Who knew ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Look !
#Text=They made a giant Kyoshi float !
#Text=" Sokka says : " And here comes Avatar Roku !
#Text=" Aang says : " Having a huge festival in your honor is great , but frankly , it 's just nice to be appreciated .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And it 's nice to appreciate their deep - fried festival food !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , look !
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's the biggest me I 've ever seen !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Now a torch , that 's a nice prop .
#Text=It 's bright , dangerous ... smells manly .
#Text=But I 'm not sure I could carry it off .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , what 's that guy doing ?
#Text=" Villagers says : " Down with the Avatar !
#Text="
